quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
author: Steve Jobs
interpretation: This quote emphasizes the importance of passion in one's work. It suggests that true excellence is born from a deep love and enjoyment of the tasks one undertakes.
what_it_means_for_me: To me, this is a reminder to always seek out work that I am passionate about, as that is where I will find the most fulfillment and produce my best results.
